title: Roasting-tin chicken, sweet potatoes and peppers

ingredients.item: 2 sweet potatoes, scrubbed and cut into wedges
2 red peppers, deseeded and cut into wide strips
4 tsp roasted red pepper & almond pesto, to serve

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ËšC, gas mark 6. Put the sweet potatoes and peppers in a large, shallow tin, drizzle with a little of the oil and sprinkle with the smoked paprika. Toss until lightly coated.

Tuck in the chicken breasts, garlic halves and lemon thyme sprigs. Drizzle with the remaining oil and roast for 30 minutes until the vegetables are tender and the chicken is cooked through, the juices run clear and no pink meat remains. Roughly shred the kale and add to the tin for the last 5 minutes of cooking.
Divide between plates and serve with a spoonful of pesto.
